column2: Today is a sad day. The dog I became the guardian of, that has loyally defended my family and I from evil spirits, has passed away. Today is a day of mourning and sorrow.

column2: Never was there a better hunter.

column2: The dog called Vanghapara is known as a vigilant creature of the Spenta Mainyu. As darkness beckons this dog wakes to keep us safe from its evil creatures. This is why it is such a popular pet among [Root.Religion.GetName] families.
